description: The Sena UltraSlim Pouch for the Apple iPod Touch is individually hand-crafted from the finest Italian Napa leather with Sena's well-known quality and strong attention to detail. The pouch is a special Sena design offering an ultra slim solution for those who dislike the extra bulk of common protective cases-it is the leanest case Sena offers for the iPod Touch. The slim curve hugging leather and velvet lining is as close to naked as the iPod Touch can get. The UltraSlim Pouch is designed with pebble soft thin leather and also includes speaker openings for the iTouch. The thin pouch design is perfect for individuals who prefer carrying the iPod Touch in a pant or jacket pocket.
title: Sena Ultra Slim Pouch Case for iPod touch 1G, 2G, 3G (Black)
